Package common.utils

Class ConnectionState

java.lang.Object
common.utils.ConnectionState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ConnectionState extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the status of a connection.

    • socketIncomingData

      public boolean socketIncomingData() throws IOException

      Returns:
      true if a message is waiting in buffer, else false
